Name: NinjaFall
About the game: NinjaFall is a ninja combat game. Inspired by new-classics from Duck Game to TowerFall , it's a 4-player local and online fighting game centering around creating your own Ninjutsu to use in versus matches. The core mechanics are simple and accessible, but hard to master. Select from a variety of different NinjaTools, a selection of unique levels and create dozens of different jutsu on command. NinjaFall is best played competitively with friends! Features NinfaFall include: Arcade Mode: Climb the tower to victory. 8 Distinct maps. Multiple game changing NinjaTools. An online mode to challenge friends across the world. Multiple Characters. Over 25 different jutsu to create on the fly.
